alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 09 at 1:22PM MST until January 09 at 2:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Central Beaverhead County in southwestern Montana... * Until 200 PM MST. * At 122 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near Dillon to 28 miles southeast of Jackson, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow. Gusty winds leading to blowing snow and visibility rapidly falling to less than one-quarter mile. Wind gusts greater than 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. Locations impacted include... Dillon and Beaverhead Rock State Park. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions. SNOW SQUALL...RADAR INDICATED
